name: Tick... Boom! Backup
description:
This is a backup for my GMTK entry, which appears to have uploaded completely the wrong file.  Unfortunately I can't change it right now, but maybe you could play it here, and then rate it there?

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/463371

up to you.

A 1 second fuse...

A single key will defuse the bomb

Use your keyboard to find the defuse key.  Getting close will buy you a little time, so mash those keys fast!
